participant_1.background:
My mother's bedtime stories helped to develop my love of reading.
I keep my home so clean that it's almost a museum.
I don't know much about my parents because they left me when I was young.
I make enough money to be able to enjoy my hobbies, like music.
I fear that my writing will never be good enough.

participant_2.background:
I secretly watch wrestling to take my mind off the stress of running my juicing bar.
i like to eat meat.
I injured my knee during the season.
i have horrible allergies.
i can t drive.

content.text: I have a lot of allergies, but I love to read.
I have horrible allergies too! I like to watch wrestling to take my mind off of it.
I never got into wrestling. I used to love reading my mother's bedtime stories when I was a kid.
That's so cool! I don't really know my parents because they left me when I was young.
That's terrible! I'm sorry to hear that. I make enough money to be able to enjoy my hobbies, like music.
That's awesome! I wish I had more money to enjoy my hobbies. I like to eat meat, but I'm trying to be more healthy.
I'm a vegetarian, but I love to cook. I keep my home so clean that it's almost a museum.
That's so interesting! I used to run a juicing bar, but I had to stop because of my knee injury.
I'm so sorry to hear that! I'm glad you found a way to take your mind off of it.
Thanks! It's been a long journey, but I'm finally on the right track.
